title: The Edge
caption: liquid drum and bass, rolling breakbeats, deep sub bass, atmospheric pads, smooth and energetic, dance music female vocals, euphoric and bright
lyrics:
[INTRO]
Wait—
hold on—
no, like this—

[VERSE 1]
I keep moving before I’m ready
like my feet know something I don’t
Every thought skips
halfway through itself

I meant to stop
I swear I did
but the ground keeps rewinding
under me

[PRE-CHORUS]
My head runs faster
than my mouth can keep up

[CHORUS]
I’m racing the edge
not the fall
not the ending

Just the moment
right before
everything stutters

I don’t want to disappear
I want to feel the glitch

[VERSE 2]
There’s noise in my chest
that won’t sit still
memories buffering
out of order

I say your—
no—
I don’t say it

I leave it hanging
like a dropped signal

[BREAK / DECONSTRUCTION]
step—
cut—
repeat—

Hands shaking
frame skipping
still not stopping

[CHORUS – FRACTURED]
I’m at the edge
edge
edge

Not jumping
not staying

Just late
again

[BRIDGE]
If I slow down
everything catches me

If I keep going
I might outrun
my own weight

[FINAL CHORUS]
I’m racing the edge of the planet
to see what breaks first
the ground
or me

I’m not looking for answers
I’m looking for impact

[OUTRO]
Still moving
Still here

—don’t cut it yet—
